mapper.select: SELECT m_userid AS username, m_password AS password, m_name, m_tel, m_address, m_email, enableD FROM tbl_member WHERE m_userid = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_member( M_USERID,M_PASSWORD, M_NAME,M_TEL,M_ADDRESS,M_EMAIL, ENABLED, AccountNonExpired, AccountNonLocked, CredentialsNonExpired ) VALUES ( #{username},#{password}, #{m_name},#{m_tel},#{m_address},#{m_email}, #{enabled},'1','1','1' )
